Minato throws a [[Flying Thunder God Kunai]] in front of the opponent and Kushina appears where it lands, hitting the target with a frying pan. Minato goes above the opponent and uses [[Rasengan]], and Kushina finishes with a powerful punch that breaks the ground.

== Trivia ==
* The technique's name is a combination of the nicknames from its users, "Red Hot-Blooded Habanero" and "Yellow Flash".
